skill.name: fiftyone-dataset-import
skill.description: Universal dataset import for FiftyOne supporting all media types (images, videos, point clouds, 3D scenes), all label formats (COCO, YOLO, VOC, CVAT, KITTI, etc.), and multimodal grouped datasets. Use when users want to import any dataset regardless of format, automatically detect folder structure, handle autonomous driving data with multiple cameras and LiDAR, or create grouped datasets from multimodal data. Requires FiftyOne MCP server.
skill.summary: Universal dataset import for FiftyOne supporting all media types (images, videos, point clouds, 3D s...
skill.author: AdonaiVera

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill definition (SKILL.md) with no executable code. The document guides AI agents on how to help users import datasets into FiftyOne. All operations are standard dataset management tasks requiring user permission.

content.value_statement: Importing datasets into FiftyOne requires understanding multiple formats and structures. This skill automatically detects media types, label formats, and grouping patterns to simplify dataset creation.
actual_capabilities: Auto-detect media types (images, videos, point clouds, 3D scenes)
Recognize label formats (COCO, YOLO, VOC, CVAT, KITTI, OpenLABEL)
Identify multimodal grouping patterns for autonomous driving data
Handle complex folder structures and scene-based organization
Install required packages for specialized formats (pandaset, nuScenes, etc.)
Create grouped datasets from multimodal data with multiple sensors
limitations: Requires FiftyOne MCP server and @voxel51/io plugin installed
Cannot import proprietary formats without their devkit packages
Point cloud conversion requires open3d for non-PCD formats
Very large datasets may require batch processing

use_cases.title: Import labeled datasets
use_cases.description: Import COCO, YOLO, or VOC labeled datasets for model training and evaluation in FiftyOne.

use_cases.title: Load multimodal sensor data
use_cases.description: Import nuScenes, PandaSet, or KITTI formats with cameras, LiDAR, and radar data in grouped scenes.

use_cases.title: Convert point cloud datasets
use_cases.description: Convert LiDAR data from pickle or binary formats to PCD for 3D visualization and analysis.

prompt_templates.title: Basic import
prompt_templates.prompt: Import the dataset at /path/to/data into FiftyOne. Scan the directory first to detect the format and structure.

prompt_templates.title: COCO labels
prompt_templates.prompt: Import the images from /data/images with COCO annotations from /data/annotations.json into a new dataset called my-dataset.

prompt_templates.title: Multimodal groups
prompt_templates.prompt: Import the nuScenes-style dataset at /data with multiple cameras and LiDAR. Detect the grouping pattern and create a grouped dataset.

prompt_templates.title: Point cloud conversion
prompt_templates.prompt: Convert the LiDAR point clouds from .pkl.gz format to .pcd and import into FiftyOne with 3D cuboid labels.

output_examples.input: Import the dataset at /user/data/coco_dataset into FiftyOne
output: Detected 80 classes with bounding boxes and segmentation
Ready to view in FiftyOne App

best_practices: Always scan the directory structure before importing to understand the format
Confirm detected settings with the user before creating the dataset
Validate sample counts match source files after import
Use grouped datasets for multimodal data to preserve scene relationships
anti_patterns: Skipping the scan step and guessing the format manually
Importing without confirming the label types with the user
Overwriting existing datasets without asking for permission
Importing grouped data as flat dataset destroying sensor relationships

faq.question: What formats are supported?
faq.answer: Images, videos, point clouds, 3D scenes. Labels: COCO, YOLO, VOC, CVAT, KITTI, OpenLABEL, TF Records, and more.

faq.question: What is the maximum dataset size?
faq.answer: FiftyOne handles large datasets. For 100K+ samples, use delegated execution and consider batch importing.

faq.question: How does it integrate with existing tools?
faq.answer: Uses FiftyOne MCP server and @voxel51/io plugin. Works with any FiftyOne-compatible workflow.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Data stays local. The skill only reads files and creates FiftyOne dataset references. No data is sent externally.

faq.question: Why is import slow?
faq.answer: Large datasets take time. For better performance, use glob patterns, batch processing, or delegated execution.

faq.question: How is this different from other import methods?
faq.answer: Auto-detection reduces manual configuration. Handles complex multimodal groups that standard imports cannot.
